snippet: An elaborate promotional campaign seeks to reintroduce the Babar brand to American children ahead of 2013, the 80th anniversary of the United States publication of the first Babar book.
abstract: Stuart Elliot Advertising column; elaborate promotional campaign is aiming to reintroduce Babar brand to American children ahead of 2013, 80th anniversary of the United States publication of the first book about the elephant king.
lead_paragraph: An elaborate promotional campaign seeks to reintroduce the Babar brand to American children ahead of 2013, the 80th anniversary of the United States publication of the first Babar book.

headline.seo: Babar, King of Elephants, Celebrates 80th Anniversary
headline.main: A New Coronation for the King of the Elephants
headline.print_headline: A New Coronation for the King of the Elephants
